events.message: We have received the application from the candidate interested in the software engineer position in our backend team.
The application has been categorized under Engineering due to the candidate's experience as a developer and software skills.
Recruiter John Smith has been assigned to oversee the hiring process for the software engineer candidate.
Initial screening call was completed with the candidate, discussing their experience in backend development and devops practices.
The candidate has responded positively to the screening feedback and expressed eagerness to proceed to the technical interview.
Technical interview has been scheduled for the candidate with the engineering team to evaluate software development skills.
The candidate successfully completed the technical interview, demonstrating strong engineering knowledge and practical coding skills.
HR interview is scheduled to discuss company culture fit and candidate's expectations following the positive technical interview.
HR interview was completed positively, with both sides agreeing on candidateâ€™s values and alignment with the company vision.
A formal offer has been proposed to the software engineer candidate, including detailed compensation and benefits.
The candidate provided positive feedback on the offer terms and expressed excitement to join the engineering team.
Candidate has officially accepted the offer and agreed to the terms for joining our software engineering team.
Onboarding process has started for the new software engineer, including account setups and initial training schedules.
The hiring case is now closed successfully with the candidate fully onboarded into the engineering department.
